title: The Hip-Hop map
name: The Hip-Hop map
description:
A Map by Bigtomisin

This map is dedicated to anything hip-hop. Place all things hiphop related to the map like events, practice spots, graffiti location and more.

properties.name: BBOY MASTERS PRO AM CHICAGO October 21st
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin1909 S. Laramie Ave, Chicago, IL.J-Boogie/SELF-X CREW/Wayneski-Zulu Kings host: BBOY MASTERS PRO AM CHICAGO October 21st, 2006 @ Cicero Stadium 1909 S. Laramie Ave. Chicago, IL. Info: 847-989-9481 Battles include: -5 on 5 crew battle -B-Girl cypher: b-girls will go head to head in a cypher for 20 minutes and the b-girl that kills the circle will be the winner! -B-Boy/B-Girl fashion show -special guest MC\'s Maintain and K-Solo -Highlight of the evening will be the all out, no holds ULTIMATE CIRCLE. This is a B-Boy Masters Pro Am tradition and will be the highlight of the evening!!! plus: booths and open cyphers all night long!!!!!!! for more info go to: http://www.globalhiphopnetwork.com/ Peace! J-Boogie SELF-X CREW Since 1996

properties.name: BBOY SESSION sundays 11am to 12:45pm
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisinsan francisco BBOY SESSION WHERE - the rec center at 29th and lawton in the sunset district of san francisco, california, usa, WHEN - sundays 11am to 12:45pm. ya i know its short so if u show up be on time. WHO - bboys and bgirls WHAT - bboy session with music and large hardwood floor ITS GOIN TO HAPPEN EVERY WEEK FO SHO!! BEEN GOIN STRONG NOW FOR MONTHS!! BE THERE! contact: www.myspace.com/eriksf smith415@gmail.com directions: . get off bart at powel ,montgomery civic center or embarcadero stations in san francisco and then get on the muni underground. take the N Judah outbound and ride 20 mins or so till u start seeing urself pass numbered avenues. ur gona be goin UP the avenues as you go toward the beach (end of the line). get off around 28th avenue and walk south 2 blocks from judah to kirkahm to LAWTON and go to 28th and lawton and ur there.

properties.name: By Any Means Necessary!!! 5on5 ,000 in Sacramento CA.
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinFair Oaks, California 95628 "Our objective is complete freedom, justice and equality by any means necessary." -Malcom X- Remedy and the Pink Ladies present... "By Any Means Necessary" So basically, this competition is being thrown from Bella Vista\'s very own Pink Ladies club and whatever is made from this jam will be donated to charities to help fight breast cancer...so come out and support ya\'ll and win that cash and remember... By any means necessary! Format will be show cased battled if more then 16 crews register and the top 8 will be chosen to battle it off for the ,000 5on5 ,000 CA PRIZE!!! 0 Entrance fee w/ student I.D. (any up to date school middle, high or college) extra for any type of camera September 9th 2006 (WEEKEND AFTER BBOY SUMMIT) Doors open at 3:30pm-10pm Held at Bella Vista High School (Large Gym) 8301 Madison Avenue Fair Oaks, California 95628 Judges: Buckingham (Flexible Flave/Zulu Kings) Mighty Max (20th Century Boyz -KOREA-) Nemesis (Breaks Kru) EXHIBITION BATTLE! KOOL-RAUL & SERGE (BEATZ N PIECEZ) VS. NEMESIS & WAK (BREAKS KRU) Swell One (Flex Flave) vs Odin Rock (Furious Styles) Host: Mahtie Bush Co-Host: TBA CREWS INVITED: Furious Styles Killafornia Breaks Kru Live Hip-Hop Performances by: Bran-Smiff Jive Theory ON THE WHEELZ OF STEELZ: Rebel Alliance VENDORS/SPONSORS INNOVATIVE NATIVE KSFM 102.5 AMERICAN KARMA CLOTHING INC

properties.name: Foundation Funkollective 909
properties.description: Posted by Foundation    Foundation Funkollective 909 Open Mic/Open Floor Hip Hop SessionsOPEN MIC * OPEN FLOOR * OPEN MIND FREE... Bring all of your friends. Yes, the Foundation Funkollective. If you\'ve gone before, you know whats up! If you didn\'t, Foundation is a positive organization here to uplift the youth thru hip hop culture. Come practice your stuff with us. Old people too. Every Wednesday will feature B-boy/B-girl sessions, freestyle dance sessions, emcee sessions, and some spoken word at Foundation\'s 909 Open Mic. Blackbooks welcome. Don\'t forget about the DJs! It will be in an art gallery with predisplayed art (you can come to just watch if ya want too). Respect the spot... This is a positive atmosphere so lets keep it that way. This is a not a club. It\'s a place to come build; if you love Hip Hop culture, you will love this. This is an alcohol and drug free event. Represent with respect. Foundation 909 OpenFloor/OpenMic Session @ Gallery by DZine Ontario Emporia Arts District 119 W Transit St., No.3 Ontario, CA 91762 9pm-12am FREE

properties.name: Freedom Fest 2006 5 on 5 000 bboy battle OHIO!!!
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin  ohio FREEDOM FEST 5 on 5 BBOY BATTLE 000 CASH PRIZE McArthur, OH (capacity - 8,000) 5 to get in for the whole 2 day event but it\'s only 0 FOR THE BBOYS WHO ARE BATTLING BBOY BATTLE DATE & TIME: July 1st Noon - 6pm (the whole event is July 1st - 2nd 10am sat - 10pm sun) HOSTED BY: Render - Smooth Kriminalz/ RP2006 - Columbus, OH JUDGES: ShonRoka - Brickheadz - Chicago, IL PoeOne - Stylelements/Zulu Kingz - Los Angeles, CA Paulskee - Los Angeles, CA DJ\'S Top Speed - Dmc - Indianapolis, IN Self - Revibelists - Columbus, OH Drastic - Revibelist/360 infinate - Columbus, OH CoreRoc - Avenue Wreck Lords - Columbus, OH Phase - Columbus, OH Special DJ Performance by RJD2 - Definitive Jux - NYC YOU MUST PRE- REGISTER BY JUNE 30th TO BATTLE NO EXEPTIONS!!! to register e-mail RendzRP@hotmail.com your CREW NAME, THE NAMES OF THE BBOYS IN YOUR CREW THAT ARE BATTLING, CITY and STATE YOUR FROM, AND A CONTACT PHONE NUMBER if you register and do not confirm when i call on june 30th, then you will not be registered. No more posts sayin "sign me up" you must e-mail me the information that\'s requested Registered Crews: 1. Kalamacrew - Michigan 2. Self X-planatory - Chicago (these are the only 2 crews who have registered so far, i know it\'s 2 months away but i need people to start registering now for main flyer info) WORKSHOPS with POE ONE(details on that soon) EXTRA *There will be skateboard and snowboard giveaways *The Midwest Aerosol Artists Competition hosted by COREROC:We will be building a 100 yard temporary wall to be painted by the best aerosol artists around. There will be a 000 dollar cash prize for the best piece. *A x-box competition on a huge display screen playing Marc Echo\'s ”Getting up”. *We will be contstructing a mini halfpipe for a skateboard exhibition featuring the best in local and national skaters. StealthEntertainment.net more info go to http://bboyrender.proboards57.com/index.cgi

properties.name: Funkstyle classes near St.louis
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinBallwin, MO 63011BY JSone of alpha reason will be teaching classes starting the 23rd of Jan. They will be from 8:30-9:30PM on Mondays and 7:00-8:00 on Wednesdays. Monday will be a little more advanced, but beginners will fit in just as well. They will be at Beutel Dance Center at Manchester and 141 in the Office Depot shopping center. The prices are as follows: 5 for one class 5 for 5 classes, 3 per class 00 for 10 classes, 0 per class @ Beutel Dance Center 37 Nationalway Shopping Ballwin, MO 63011 (This is very close to where Just Dancing is, for those of you that have been there) For anyone that doesnt know my background, I have been dancing about 6 years. The last 3 I have focused on funkstyles. I have been formally trained by the Electric Boogaloos, the creators of Popping, Boogaloo, and many other funk styles. I have knowledge and experience in other styles as well.

properties.name: Iowa bboy Practice spot in Ames
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin198 Forker What: Practice spot in Ames When:Every Thursday! From 5:00PM - 8:00PM + longer Who: Everybody from everywhere Where: 198 Forker Building, Ames, Iowa (It\'s on campus) Why: Because it\'s fun! Directions: From I-35, take the 13th Street exit and go west on 13th street(towards Ames) Keep heading west until you see a field on your left with horses and stuff, and then take a left on Haber. Go straight and through the tunnel, turn right coming out of the tunnel. Take a left at the lights. Keep going straight. At the stop sign, go straight then take your first left. That\'s the buildling. Starting at 5:30PM, you won\'t get a ticket. The room is located downstairs, just as you enter the building, just head down stairs, take your left, then left again and go straight to the studio there.

properties.name: POEONE & KoolSki Present Steady Rocking.
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinOrange, Ca. 92868 1200 W. Alvarez Ave. POEONE & KoolSki Present Steady Rocking. Lets Bring Back The Cyphers Yall, Once a month, for the rest of the year 2006. This jam is dedicated to the Cyphers. We want to see everybody just have a good time and dance all night. If you want to call someone out then do it. No judges, No Time Limits. Just straight raw BBOYing. The way its supposed to be done, In the Circles! We want to end the so called bboys that only enter a jam when theres only a big cash prize. We want everybody to represent because they want to show what SKILLZ they have. And because they just want to out do the next man. And most of all," BECAUSE THEY LOVE THE ART OF BBOYING!!!" We will be giving 2 trophies two the BBoy or Bgirl who reps the most that night. Money comes and goes, BUT Trophies last forever. We value the ones we have. So just come a show your soul yall. And lets celebrate this art that we call B-BOYING. Peace. Location: Youth A Flame 1200 W. Alvarez Ave. Orange, Ca. 92868 www.youthAflame.com Time: 7:00 P.M. Till ?????? (Time stays the same for all dates.) Cost: .00 at door. Djs: To be announced. Or who ever wants to come a rep this dope celebration. DatesOnce a month for the rest of the year 2006.) June 1st. July 13th. August 31st. September 28th. October 26th. November 30th. December 14th. We end till next year. No Video Cameras!! THIS ONES FOR THE MENTAL YALL!!!!!!! For more info contact POEONE: poeone@poeone.com thankyou To All The Sponcers that supported and to Youth A Flame for all the support they give to the Hiphop Culture. PEACE POEONE & KoolSki.

properties.name: San Diego Practice spots
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin San Diegoby:takuwan619 Monday Otay Recreation Center Main Street, Chula Vista Time: 6:00/7:30 - 9:45 Hot Monkey Love 5960 El Cajon Blvd. San Diego, CA 92115 619-582-5908 cover...all ages UCSD Main Gym Time: 9:30 - 11:00 Contact UCSD\'s Body Rock Club for details. Inquire about BBoy Babak\'s class Tuesday Culture Shock Dance Studio 2110 Hancock Street, Suite 200 Time: 8:30 - 11:00 Inquire about Optic\'s and Saso\'s bboy classes Cost: .00 Wednesday Otay Recreation Center Main Street, Chula Vista Time: 6:00 - 9:45 Thursday Dance Factory Encinitas Blvd, Encinitas Time: 8:30 - 10:00 Cost: .00 The Bus Stop Martini Ranch (Downtown) F st. and 6th 21 and up Time: Late Evening UCSD Main Gym Time: 9:30 - 11:00 Contact UCSD\'s Body Rock Club for details. Inquire about BBoy Babak\'s class Palomar Time: 6:00 - 8:00 Contact Bboy Wonderbread @ hiphopsftsoldier@aim.com Friday Moreno Club Moreno Blvd. Usually starts poppin around 11 or 12, not too much room, but they cater to the bboys there, great atmosphere. Saturday Bar Dynamite - Gets really really crowded, ciphers are really rare unless the Beat Puppets are there. good music. AC Lounge- Tough crowd. doesnt feel like the right environment to get down for some reason...for me at least. Landlord Jim\'s- good music some nights. not much room to really jam, but when the musics good...cant help doing some top rockin. Moreno Club Usually starts poppin around 11 or 12, not too much room, but they cater to the bboys there, great atmosphere. Sunday Reggae Night Martini Ranch (Downtown) F st. and 6th 21 and up Time: Late Evening There may be some other practices out there that I did not list, especially those that go down during the day time. If anyone knows of any practice spots I left out dont be afraid to post them. Again...21 and up check out Morena Club, Bar Dynamite, Red C Lounge, Air Condition Lounge, Rock Bottom (its cheap!). If you are a member of 24-Hour Fitness, you may catch some bboys at the downtown location, Hillcrest (nice floor) or at the East H street location. Done...Peace

properties.name: San Jose Practice spot
properties.description: Posted by Bigtomisin520 W. Virginia Street San Jose, CA 95125 Gardner Community Center will be open for dancers of ALL ages starting Tuesday, March 15th, 2005. The information is as follows: Where: Gardner Community Center 520 W. Virginia Street San Jose, CA 95125 408.279.1498 Directions/Maps: Google Local Mapquest Platial Yahoo Maps When: Tuesdays: 6:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m. All new participants must sign a waiver form. There is NO admission fee to use the facility. It\'s free. The multi-purpose room is almost as large as Evergreen Community Center\'s Multi-Purpose Room which accomodates about 200 people. There is A/C, mats, and speakers embedded into the walls so we get surround sound.

The center is located between James Lick High School and Pala Elementary School. The information is as follows: Where: Alum Rock Youth Center 137 North White Road San Jose, CA 95127 408.251.5757 Directions/Maps: Google Local Mapquest Platial Yahoo Maps When: Wednesdays: 6:00 p.m. - 8:30 p.m. (please enter through the side doors to get to the gym) All new participants must sign a waiver form. properties.name: ZERO GRAVITY 5
properties.description: Posted by BigtomisinSyracuse, NY ZERO GRAVITY INC. & ZERO GRAVITY FRANCE Presents... ZERO GRAVITY 5 2 vs 2 International Breakdance Championship Date: Mid September (TBA) Location: Syracuse, NY OPEN REGISTRATION AVAILABLE 2 vs 2 Breakance Battles (32 slots) :: WINNER GETS $ 1200 CASH ATTENTION !! READ THIS !! RULE OF THE GAME !! The first round, you will be allowed to use only one crew combo routines. If you pass to the next round, the other rounds you won\'t be allowed to use crew routines till the end. This is to see how you can perform indiviually. It shows your true potential and generates a challenge within the tournement. In order to register for the 2 vs 2 event please email us at: zerogravity_usa@yahoo.com your email should include: - your full name - your bboy/bgirl name - your crew name - where you from Zero Gravity 5 also holds other events, they will be posted soon with further details. We got crews from France & the winners from the Zero Gravity France championships will be invited for this year\'s event (USA). We got special surprise battles and more... Stay tuned... __________________ props promoters of Zero Gravity jfsrocket@aol.com bboyprops82@msn.com
